研究发现精神分裂症患者的大脑功能连接受到破坏精神分裂症是一种神经发育障碍，其症状包括精神病，被认为是由大脑连接和功能整合的紊乱引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Study-finds-disruptions-in-function-brain-connectivity-in-people-with-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Study-finds-disruptions-in-function-brain-connectivity-in-people-with-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9849fbdd-5551-488d-b447-cee7fd454e7f Tue, 17 Oct 2023 11:27:31 -0400 Study finds disruptions in functional brain connectivity in people with schizophrenia
